name: Because We're Here ~Mohnblume und Blauerose~ Act II
detailed_description:
February 1915, Wesslinger National Calendar.

A month has passed since the events of Act I. The First Lassallian War shows no signs of resolution, and rumours of a spring offensive hang heavy over either side of No Man’s Land.

At long last, Private Rauss of the Wesslinger Postal Corps enters the war in earnest. Though yet to make her peace with the tragedy that has devastated her circle of friends, Elfriede is determined to keep following her heart - even through the hell where youth and laughter go.

New Features for Act II

The Cast is Complete - The final five potential love interests make their debut in Elfriede’s story, alongside a litany of new supporting characters.

A Trench Opera Within a Trench Opera - Intermittently play as Ethel Winter, a scornful telephonist from the other side of the conflict, and see the unfortunate consequences of Elfriede’s actions first-hand.

Act II (Live and Let Live) is the longest of Because We're Here's four acts.
Estimated playthrough time is roughly 6-7 hours. Act II features 48 unique pieces of CG art.
